name: The Legend of Ogorets #1: Wrat
description: You are aboard a ship headed straight for the center of the galaxy. The Legend of Ogorets is a series featuring mature, action-packed, character-driven adventures in post-apocalyptic settings. Your choices matter. #1 is the adventure of Wrat, a desperate soul-searcher consumed by worry and driven by guilt as he realizes he’s never met his son, by now a grown man in a world of cutthroats, murderers, and bloodthirsty mercenaries. Average read time: 40-60 minutes. Some readers may find this content disturbing.
